person.persName: Gideon Perry Jolly (Breckinridge County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk and county court clerk)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk and county court clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Nelson Jolly, Jr. and Barbara Jolly. Married to Eliza Beard Jolly on September 25, 1856. Father of Bion Jolly, Nannie Jolly, Lula M Jolly, and Clara Jolly. Deputy sheriff in Breckinridge County from 1849 to 1851. Sheriff of Breckinridge County from 1851 to 1858. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1855 to 1857. Clerk of the Breckinridge Circuit Court from 1856 to 1868. Clerk of the Breckinridge County Court from 1858 to 1866. Owned four enslaved persons in 1860.
